Detailed Description

Accessor class to write data into an ObexBuffer.

ObexBuffer::Size ObexBuffer::Writer::CopyFrom (  ConstDataPtr  from_ptr,
Size  from_size
) 
 

Copies data from an external buffer.

This method reads at most 'from_size' octets from the external buffer referenced by 'from_ptr' and copies them into the ObexBuffer. The size of the ObexBuffer is updated automatically, so don't call Commit() manually when you use this style of writing.

Parameters:
from_ptr Pointer to an external buffer from which data is read and copied into the ObexBuffer
from_size Size of the data block which can be read from 'from_ptr'.
Returns:
Number of octets actually copied. This is a value between '0' and 'from_size'.

ObexBuffer::Size ObexBuffer::Writer::GetNoBytesWritable (   )  const
 

Returns the number of bytes which can be written.
